content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R3 (30.0.0)") AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Common' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New

content_parts.content:
• On the Work order page, the item ID can be displayed in the grid. When you print the pick list, it includes the finished item ID in the header.
  • On the Sales shipment page, you can edit the tracking number on the header even if the shipment is posted.
  • On the Sales order line inquiry page, the item name can be displayed in the Results grid. The shipping date ranges are based on the level shipping date at the line level, and an order date range is added to the header.
  • On the Purchase receipt, page the item ID displays in the list of order lines to add and can be displayed in the Lines grid.
  • On the Stock receipt, Stock issue, and Stock adjustment pages, the Item ID can be displayed in the lines grid.

content_parts.title: Correct attributes and dimensions on failed transfers

content_parts.content:
You can make corrections to source documents when journal entries for stock and stock count adjustments do not transfer successfully to Sage Intacct due to incorrect attribute and dimension assignments.

On the Notification history page, you can access the source document, make changes, and resend.

content_parts.title: Bug Fixes
_jql: project = XT AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R3 (30.0.0)") AND (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Distribution' AND status IN (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')))

content_parts.title: Sales order: Line panel doesn't close

content_parts.content: The sales order line detail panel closes as expected.

content_parts.title: Sales shipment: Pick list not translated into French

content_parts.content: The pick list is translated into French.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R3 (30.0.0)") AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Manufacturing' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New

content_parts.title: Serial number management: Work orders and Material tracking

content_parts.content:
When you create a Material tracking, all serial numbers allocated to the corresponding work order are transferred to the Material tracking.
When you save a Material tracking, allocated serial numbers are saved in the Material issue.
If you change an allocated serial number range in a Material tracking, the previously allocated serial numbers are automatically deallocated.

content_parts.title: Bug Fixes
_jql: project = XT AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R3 (30.0.0)") AND (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Manufacturing' AND status IN (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')))

content_parts.title: Duplicating a routing loses the operations

content_parts.content: Duplicating a routing preserves the list of production operations in the new routing.
The timeout was increased to 10 minutes.
Decimal places are displayed to the number of decimal places defined for the unit of measurement.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R3 (30.0.0)") AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Platform' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New

content_parts.content:
You can create line and bar chart widgets.

For each widget, you can

  • Select and filter data.
  • Define how data is grouped and sorted.
  • Customize colors.
  • Add calls to action.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R3 (30.0.0)") AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'User experience' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New

content_parts.content: For purchasing and sales documents, the main list displays the main document status. You can select a status in the dropdown to display all documents with the selected status. When you select a record, you see the status next to the document title and documents with the same status display in the selection list.

content_parts.title: Key actions display above the grid

content_parts.content:
When you select a record from the Main list, the actions to add a line in the {}grid or in a panel display directly above the grid.

If there are lines to add from the original request, an action to add lines also displays above the grid.

This improvement was applied to Purchasing and Sales pages.
